attributes.action: Make squatting illegal in England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under many ancient and complex laws squatting is not a criminal offence in England and Wales however in Scotland it is. Recently many stories have cropped up of people coming back from holidays to find their house occupied by squatters and they are powerless to do anything about it. They have to go through complex court proceedings to get their home back. This can cost thousands of pounds. Until it is illegal the victims have no justice.
